name: Otto Environment Tag CFs
snippet: <fmxmlsnippet type="FMObjectList"><CustomFunction id="4" functionArity="0" visible="True" parameters="" name="isDevServer"><Calculation><![CDATA[Left ( Get ( HostName ) ; 6 ) = "[DEV] "]]></Calculation></CustomFunction><CustomFunction id="5" functionArity="0" visible="True" parameters="" name="isStagingServer"><Calculation><![CDATA[Left ( Get ( HostName ) ; 6 ) = "[STG] "]]></Calculation></CustomFunction><CustomFunction id="6" functionArity="0" visible="True" parameters="" name="isProdServer"><Calculation><![CDATA[Left ( Get ( HostName ) ; 7 ) = "[PROD] "]]></Calculation></CustomFunction></fmxmlsnippet>
description: Custom Functions to check the environment tag according to OttoFMS
